sentences.english: Temperatures over 44 degrees C (110 degrees F) made clambering down the steep slopes arduous.
sentences.chinese: 由於氣溫超過44℃，因此由陡坡攀爬下山非常費力。

sentences.english: The incipient motion of uniform sediment on non-horizontal slope was theoretically studied.
sentences.chinese: 對均勻沙在陡坡上的起動機理作了分析。

sentences.english: Thegravely soil is capable of draining water as well as a steep hillside.
sentences.chinese: “愛恨味”葡萄園處陡坡之上，土壤排水能力非常強。

sentences.english: The northern abrupt slope of Dongying Sag is the developed area of sandy conglomeratic body.
sentences.chinese: 東營凹陷北部陡坡帶是砂礫岩體發育地區。

sentences.english: His small car sometimes jibs at a steep hill .
sentences.chinese: 我的汽車有時遇到陡坡會停的。

sentences.english: A steep market street descends from the Mid-Levels to Sheung Wan.
sentences.chinese: 半山一個建於陡坡的菜市場，沿街伸展到上環。

sentences.english: The leading edge slats allow for steep climb angles of up to 30-degrees.
sentences.chinese: 在前緣縫翼允許30度角的陡坡攀登到。

sentences.english: The road descends steeply near that village.
sentences.chinese: 在那村子附近，這條路下一個陡坡。

sentences.english: The continental shelf is very narrow, and terminates seaward in an abrupt slope.
sentences.chinese: 大陸架非常狹窄，盡頭處形成向海洋深處延伸的陡坡。

sentences.english: I shall call hills steep which ought to be bold.
sentences.chinese: 我會把本應被稱作嵯峨的山崗叫作陡坡。

sentences.english: Climbing roadway can improve the condition of the steep slope road.
sentences.chinese: 爬坡車道的設置可顯著改善陡坡路段的行車條件。

sentences.english: We were winded by the steep climb.
sentences.chinese: 我們爬那個陡坡累得上氣不接下氣。

sentences.english: The road made an abrupt rise up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 上坡時，這條路有個陡坡。

sentences.english: My car sometimes jibs at a steep hill.
sentences.chinese: 我的汽車有時遇到陡坡會停的。

sentences.english: The cars usually start out by being pulled up a steep hill with a chain drive.
sentences.chinese: 車廂在一開始通常會被鏈條傳送裝置拉向一個陡坡。

sentences.english: A stream, in spate after summer rains, descends through Kadoorie Farm.
sentences.chinese: 仲夏山溪逢雨迸發，沿嘉道理農場的陡坡奔流而下。

definition: uphill/upslope/to move upwards/to climb a slope
